channel.title: Did I miss something?
channel.description: So there was a patch today. And afterwards I played in a possessor game where 14 died and was a physician. But then that night 14 was in the graveyard saying 1 was possessor. I honestly didn't stay very much longer but does possessor not appear as that persons class when they jump now? Or was this guy trolling?

item.title: Did I miss something?
item.dc:creator: Finitethrills
item.description:
It sounds like he figured out who the nk was and was trying to pass it along? I don’t think a jump was involved at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Did I miss something?

item.description:
So there was a patch today. And afterwards I played in a possessor game where 14 died and was a physician. But then that night 14 was in the graveyard saying 1 was possessor. I honestly didn’t stay very much longer but does possessor not appear as that persons class when they jump now? Or was this guy trolling?
